doc.title: Erotic Fantasies special edition
doc.plot: This is not actually a film with a plot but rather a made for video compilation of hard core lesbian scenes put together by some unknown production company to capitalize on the fame of some "Adult Actresses". It should not be listed in Brigitte Maier's filmography since her scenes are are clipped from "Poor i skandalskolan" (Sweden), a/k/a "The Second Coming of Eva" (US Title) and likely done without her knowledge.
